extendedInfo.description: Files Drag & Drop is an application that allows you to transfer data (files/text/url) quickly from your computer to your Android device and vice versa, using wifi networks.You don't need to use a browser or to know the ip address of your device, you just need to download the software for your computer at this address : http://www.filesdnd.com/downloadThe software is available for Windows and Mac OS X and will be ported on Linux.Also, it allows you to transfer data between all your computers, and we made a desktop widget for an even quicker transfer !With this application, you can put all kinds of data on your devices, like files, folders, text, or links.When you receveive a file, it can be automatically opened by your device, and the same apply to web link.(To open files automatically on Android, you need the full version, free on Pc/Mac).You can also transfer files, or open a web page from your device to another device, or your Pc/Mac, using the share functionnality. You won't need to send youself files and links by mail anymore !This application has been designed to work as a service in order to avoid constant action on your device when you want to transfer data. Activate it, and you're done with your device!It can be in your pocket or even asleep, you'll still be able to send data to it. (Full version required for Android, free on Pc/Mac)A trust system has been included, devices that you have authorized are allowed to send you data!Don't hesitate to follow us to see the next features we will bring, and contact us if you discover a bug or have any suggestions. We listen to our users.If you are having problems with detection, go to 'settings' in the app and select Resolve detection problem.If you want our app to work when your device is in tethering, you must activate this settings.This app is a lite version, with most of the above features but you can only download a maximum of 5 files per day. You can buy the full version (by in-app payment) in order to gain access to all of the features and unlimited downloads.Launch promotion:For the full version (by in-app payment)50% discount until we reach 1000 purchases, then the price will be raised to the equivalent of 4 â¬/5$.Full version features:- Multi-files download- Folder download- Unlimited number of downloads- Open file automatically- Background service- No adsRequirements:- Android version >= 2.3- WifiWe use Google Analytics in order to know which functionnalities are the most used, it's completly anonymous and no personal data is shared.Follow us:https://www.facebook.com/FilesDNDhttps://twitter.com/FilesDnDKeywords: file transfer, drag & drop, wifi, copy, past, text, URL, link, file, folder, directory, clipboard, server, client, drag, drop, Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, files dnd

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I was always tired of having to hook up my phone to my computer to copy files.  Now, I no longer have to do that.  Just drag a file to the program on your computer and it is sent to your phone automatically.
reviews.author: Marc Beck

reviews.title: Must have App
reviews.comment: I have Galaxy S4 and galaxy note 2 I was looking for an easy way to transfer my files between them and my PC too. I tried many apps but this one is the most I like. very easy to use and friendly UI.
reviews.author: Abdulrahman Alhosani

reviews.title: No wifi hotspot compatible
reviews.comment: Most of wifi related apps don\'t work with wifi hotspot and this is also not different.  They need wifi network to work with PC/Laptop.Why most of developers are unaware of hotspot? Why to need entire wifisetup when we can communicate directly our Android with PC/Laptop through hotspot. But still there are some wifi apps working well with hotspot.
